contact_details.contact_value: 555 County Center, First Floor, Redwood City, CA 94063

data.name: Birth Certificate
data.description: Birth certificates are used for many official governmental purposes such as Social Security, passport applications and school enrollments. They are sometimes used for non-official registrations such as little league. You can purchase a certified copy of a birth certificate in person only.

allfaq.question: How long does it take to get them if i am there in person?
allfaq.answer: You should get it the same day (except for pre-1966 requests).

allfaq.question: How long does it take to get them if i applied online?
